summary: As pioneers of the Dirty South music movement, Organized Noize is responsible for Outkast, CeeLo, the Goodie Mob and the Dungeon Family. Their production shaped the landscape of hip-hop ... See full summary »
cast: 2 Chainz|André 3000|Big Boi|Sleepy Brown|Ian Burke|Sean 'Diddy' Combs|Bryan Michael Cox|Future|Big Gipp|CeeLo Green|Ludacris|Raymond Murray|Pebbles|L.A. Reid|T-Mo|Bobby V|Rico Wade
title: The Art of Organized Noize
